The misleading Facebook post: which included a photo of Shah Rukh Khan and a caption claiming he was arrested at Heathrow Airport during the CAA protests.
The reference to India: s main opposition party, the Indian National Congress, and the UK's newly elected government, which was formed in December 2019.
The mention of the Rashtriya Swayamsevak: RSS), an Indian Hindu nationalist organization.
The false claim was debunked by London: s Metropolitan Police, who confirmed that there was no record of Shah Rukh Khan's arrest at Heathrow Airport on December 28, 2019.
